page.title: 01BISHOP THORNTON, N. YORKS.
page.content: This area is a rural, mainly farming area and a dormitory for Harrogate, Leeds and Bradford. The main income other than farming comes from tourism. There are two Motels, a Caravan site and many Bed and Breakfast establishments. A hand-made Furniture factory and a Frozen Food business are the only other occupations. London 210 miles, Edinburgh 200 miles Harrogate 7 miles, Leeds 24 miles, Bradford 24 miles. Ripon 7 miles. Local beauty spot Brimham Rocks. Nearby sites of Historical interest Fountains Abbey and Ripley Castle. Places of interest Knaresborough 8 miles, Castle Museum and Dropping Well. Pateley Bridge l0 miles, How Stean Gorge and Stump Cross Caverns. York 22 miles, Jorvic Viking Centre, National Railway Museum, Castle Museum and Yorkshire Museum.
